|TInterface\ICONS\Ships_ABILITY_Bombers.blp:24:24:0:0|t |cffffffff Carrier|r
Massive frozen ice chunks float on the surface of the water.  Navigating through the maze of ice leaves your ships vulnerable to attack.
Powerful wind gusts, violent lightning strikes, and rogue waves are just three concerns when sailing through Stormy Weather.
A Dense Fog coats this location in absolute darkness.
Chaotic Whirlpools appear without reason or warning, causing havoc on any vessel trying to pass through.
Accelerates through water with reckless power, half of the battle is just keeping up. The other half is physical.
Capable of making abrupt turns without warning, this is a difficult target to hit.
As a minelayer, this ship dispenses proximity mines behind it, leaving a treacherous trail to follow.
A quick opening attack that can end a battle before it begins.
A ship run by a veteran captain, well versed in nuanced naval combat.  Expert Captains cannot be countered directly, but must be accounted for to succeed.

An objective that requires moving goods or troops to locations on land.
